articles.title: These 8 habits could add up to 24 years to your life: study - New York Post
articles.description: Adopting healthier habits by middle age will pay dividends in the future, according to a new study presented at the American Society for Nutrition’s annual meeting on Monday.
articles.content:
Apparently there’s eight simple rules to add years to your life.
